x, y = np.loadtxt('./peeemtee/tests/samples/single_gaussian_values.txt',
    unpack=True)
popt = {'entries': 254.67033173856782, 'nphe': 0.09948503314900548,
    'ped_mean': -0.0010005760657697902, 'ped_sigma': 0.012413241559483338,
    'spe_charge': 0.2016217091151677, 'spe_sigma': 0.10110260065504383}
fitter = ChargeHistFitter()
fitter.popt_prf = popt
np.testing.assert_array_equal(y, fitter.single_gaussian_values(x, 1))
